ygData.subject: A bit o help
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a boon to ask of ye, me friends. I have need of a better map to the ruins of lower Guk. The maps I have found from the many cartographers around fail to
ygData.messageBody:
I have a boon to ask of ye, me friends.
I have need of a better map to the ruins of lower Guk. The maps I have found
from the many cartographers around fail to lead me true.
Any help you may offer in this manner would be greatly appreciated.
-Martyn

[OOC: The maps out there that I have found fail to show the Assassin room. I
would love to be able to get there, or near, to get a basalt Carapace to
wear (and perhaps one of the new masks)
I was in lower Guk much of last night, and both were up for free loot, but I
could not find a guide to the assassin room. by the time I did find a guide
(a few hours later), There were only 20 people in the zone, and bad things
were everywhere. I did get greaves and gauntlets. Much better to wear than
bronze]
